entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then showers beginning after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 15 with temperature falling to 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 15 with temperature falling to 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
